sentences.english: Patients with epilepsy or bipolar disorder can have difficulty swallowing tablets.
sentences.chinese: 癲癇病人或雙相性精神障礙病人對吞嚥藥物有困難。

sentences.english: Objective To study the quality of life of the psychomotor epilepsy children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討精神運動性癲癇兒童的生活質量。

sentences.english: To explore the value of electroencephalogram(EEG) after depriving sleep in the diagnosis of epilepsy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討剝奪睡眠腦電圖在小兒癲癇診斷中的價值。

sentences.english: Objective To study anti-epileptic drug damage to the peripheral nerves.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究抗癲癇藥物對周圍神經的損害。

sentences.english: Cheating on the diet—such as eating a candy bar—can bring on a seizure in minutes.
sentences.chinese: 在飲食上作弊，比如喫塊方糖，會馬上引起癲癇發作。

sentences.english: Conclusion There was an obviously difference of the correlational language cortex between subjects and patients with temporal epilepsy.
sentences.chinese: 結論癲癇病人的語言相關腦區與正常人有明顯的差異。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical effectiveness of hemispherectomy on intractable epilepsy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討大腦半球切除術治療頑固性癲癇的臨牀效果。

sentences.english: Objective To introduce the surgical experience in treating intractable occipital lobe epilepsy.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結頑固性枕葉癲癇患者的手術治療經驗。

sentences.english: It contains a mixture of a stimulant and an anti-epilepsy drug.
sentences.chinese: 它包括了一種興奮劑和一種抗癲癇藥。

sentences.english: What Causes Seizure in Focal Epilepsy?
sentences.chinese: 什麼原因導致局竈性癲癇發作？

sentences.english: Objective To explore the risk factors for postoperative seizure in patients with brain arteriovenous malformation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腦動靜脈畸形術後癲癇發生的危險因素。

sentences.english: AIM To investigate the pharmacokinetic profile of carbamazepine (CBZ) in Chinese epilepsy patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察中國癲癇患者卡馬西平的羣體藥動學參數。

sentences.english: But when it comes to keto's impact on pediatric seizures, there is wide acceptance.
sentences.chinese: 但是，酮類治療兒童癲癇發作卻獲得了廣泛認可。

sentences.english: Why are there so many types of epilepsies?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼癲癇有許多類型？

sentences.english: The successful rate of the status epilepticus models was 50%.
sentences.chinese: 癲癇持續狀態模型成功率爲50%。

sentences.english: Close to 90% of epilepsy cases worldwide are found in developing regions.
sentences.chinese: 世界上接近90%的癲癇病例發生在發展中國家地區。

definition: vertigo/dizziness/fainting/feeling of swaying, head spinning, lack of balance or floating (e.g. from a stroke)/Taiwan pr. [xuan4 yun1]
